cz.tomasdvorak.eet.client

Interface EETClient


  • public interface EETClient
    EET client implementation, handling computation of security codes, signing of requests, validation of responses.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SubmitResult submitReceipt(TrzbaDataType receipt, CommunicationMode mode, EndpointType endpointType, SubmissionType submissionType)
      Central and only method of EET.
      Future<?> submitReceipt(TrzbaDataType receipt, CommunicationMode mode, EndpointType endpointType, SubmissionType submissionType, ResponseCallback handler) 

    • Method Detail

      • submitReceipt

        SubmitResult submitReceipt(TrzbaDataType receipt,
                           CommunicationMode mode,
                           EndpointType endpointType,
                           SubmissionType submissionType)
                    throws DataSigningException,
                           CommunicationException
        Central and only method of EET. Send the receipt data to selected endpoint, select if it's first or repeated submission and if the communication is test only or real.
        Parameters:
        receipt - Receipt data - price, date, tax numbers, ...
        mode - real or test submission
        endpointType - playground or real endpoint
        submissionType - first or repeated submission
        Returns:
        EET response with added request needed to access security codes and other data in case of failed submission
        Throws:
        DataSigningException - Failed to compute PKP or BKP
        CommunicationException - Failed to send or receive data from EET endpoint

      • submitReceipt

        Future<?> submitReceipt(TrzbaDataType receipt,
                        CommunicationMode mode,
                        EndpointType endpointType,
                        SubmissionType submissionType,
                        ResponseCallback handler)
                 throws DataSigningException
        Throws:
        DataSigningException
